direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods check for the presence of an element in the map, but one checks for a key and the other for a value.
The get method retrieves values associated with keys, which is related to the value presence check in containsValue.
Both methods interact with the map's elements, but remove modifies the map by removing an element.
The put method modifies the map by adding or updating key-value pairs, which is related to the value presence check in containsValue.
The clear method removes all elements from the map, which is related to the value presence check in containsValue.
